top_comment.text:
when we were riding back down the lift a guy asked us to buy weed under the 
lift﻿
top_comment.author: Christian Garofalo

comments.text:
When I visited, the busboy in front of the airport offered me a handful of 
weed, and then the busboy at the hotel offered me another handful. People 
were walking up and down the beach with ounces of it in their pockets. 
Couldn't believe it
comments.author: Ryan Gerhard

comments.text:
I didn't experience that this time. The last time I visited Jamaica we were 
at an arts and crafts market in Ocho Rios and some guy came up behind us 
whispering and asking us if we wanted to buy. They probably target 
tourists. It's probably a scam.
comments.author: epontius

captions.text:
The Jamaican Bobsled run starts at the top
of the Mystic Mountains. You start by hopping
on a chair lift called the SkyExplorer.

The ride lasts for about 30 minutes. From
the chair lift you can see the coast line

and cruise ships docked in Ocho Rios on one
side and further over the rainforest on the

If you are scared of heights this might not
be the ride for you. Some spots you'll be

dangling 700 feet above the Jamaican rainforest.
It's a long way down!

At the end of the lift ride is a pavilion
with a gift shop and restaurant, cultural

dancing and music and the start of the bobsled
and zipline adventures.

Once you get through the line for the bobsled,
you'll be queued up and strapped in. Couples

can have their bobsled's linked together to
go down in tandem. For daredevils and speedfreaks
it is faster to go separately.

The downhill ride winds down and around through
the rainforest and lasts anywhere from a minute

to 2 depending on whether you chose to brake
during descent.

Once you reach the bottom, you'll start a
slow automated tow back up the mountain. Take

the opportunity to look around the jungle
and take in the panicked screams from other

Also on your way up, you'll pass the zipline
tours as they make their way down the mountain.

Once you reach the top you are directed to
exit through the gift shop.

title: Jamaican Bobsled Adventure in Ocho Rios, Jamaica
